languages.text: {n}Вы вновь слышите голос друкари, но не видите, кто говорит с вами.{/n} "Ты хотел{mf||а} сказать "создал"? Я хранил запасную оболочку многие столетия, но после того, что случилось в шпиле Опустошительной бури, счел одно активное тело недостаточным".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы вновь слышите голос друкари, но не видите, кто говорит с вами{/n} "Ты хотел{mf||а} сказать "создал"? Я хранил запасную оболочку многие столетия, но после того, что случилось в шпиле Опустошительной бури,, счел одно активное тело недостаточным".
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}You hear the Drukhari's voice again but cannot see who is talking to you.{/n} "'Found'? Don't you mean 'made'? I've had a backup shell stored away for centuries, but the events at the Spire of the Reaving Tempest convinced me one active body was not enough."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы вновь слышите голос друкари, но не видите, кто говорит с вами.{/n} "Ты хотел{mf||а} сказать "создал"? Я хранил запасную оболочку многие столетия, но после того, что случилось в шпиле Опустошительной бури, счел одно активное тело недостаточным".

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear the Drukhari's voice again but can't see who is talking to you. "'Found'? Don't you mean 'made'? I'd had a backup shell stored away for centuries, but the events at the Spire of the Reaving Tempest convinced me one active body was not enough."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

traits.speaker: Haemonculus

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear the Drukhari's voice again but cannot see who is talking to you.{/n} "'Found'? Don't you mean 'made'? I've had a backup shell stored away for centuries, but the events at the Spire of the Reaving Tempest convinced me one active body was not enough."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}血伶人的声音再次响了起来，但你分辨不出说话的人是谁。{/n}“‘找到’？你应该是想说‘制造’吧？几百年来，我一直都为自己准备好了备用的身体。但狂风阴谋团尖塔发生的事情让我意识到，只有一个备用身体是远远不够的。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the Drukhari's voice again but cannot see who is talking to you.{/n} "'Found'? Don't you mean 'made'? I've had a backup shell stored away for centuries, but the events at the Spire of the Reaving Tempest convinced me one active body was not enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人的声音再次响了起来，但你分辨不出说话的人是谁。{/n}“‘找到’？你应该是想说‘制造’吧？几百年来，我一直都为自己准备好了备用的身体。但狂风阴谋团尖塔发生的事情让我意识到，只有一个备用身体是远远不够的。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Du hörst wieder die Stimme des Drukhari, kannst jedoch nicht erkennen, wer mit dir spricht.{/n} "'Gefunden'? Ihr meint wohl eher 'gemacht'. Ich hatte seit Jahrhunderten eine Ersatzhülle eingelagert, doch die Ereignisse im Turm des plündernden Sturms haben mich überzeugt, dass ein aktiver Körper nicht ausreicht."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the Drukhari's voice again but cannot see who is talking to you.{/n} "'Found'? Don't you mean 'made'? I've had a backup shell stored away for centuries, but the events at the Spire of the Reaving Tempest convinced me one active body was not enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst wieder die Stimme des Drukhari, kannst jedoch nicht erkennen, wer mit dir spricht.{/n} "'Gefunden'? Ihr meint wohl eher 'gemacht'. Ich hatte seit Jahrhunderten eine Ersatzhülle eingelagert, doch die Ereignisse im Tumr des plündernden Sturms haben mich überzeugt, dass ein aktiver Körper nicht ausreicht."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Vuelves a oír la voz del Drukhari, pero no ves quién te está hablando.{/n} «¿"Acompañado"? ¿Te refieres a este cascarón que me he fabricado? Tenía un cuerpo de reserva que llevaba siglos almacenado, pero tras lo sucedido en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora me quedó claro que no bastaba con tener un solo cuerpo activo».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the Drukhari's voice again but cannot see who is talking to you.{/n} "'Found'? Don't you mean 'made'? I've had a backup shell stored away for centuries, but the events at the Spire of the Reaving Tempest convinced me one active body was not enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vuelves a oír la voz del Drukhari, pero no ves quién te está hablando.{/n} «¿"Acompañado"? ¿Te refieres a este cascarón que me he fabricado? Tenía un cuerpo de reserva que llevaba siglos almacenado, pero tras lo sucedido en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora me quedó claro que no bastaba con tener un solo cuerpo activo».
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez à nouveau la voix du Drukhari, sans toutefois pouvoir déterminer d'où elle provient.{/n} « Trouvé ? "Fabriqué", vous voulez dire ! Cela faisait des siècles que je stockais une enveloppe de secours, mais les événements de la tour de la Tempête ravageuse m'ont convaincu qu'un seul corps actif ne suffisait pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the Drukhari's voice again but cannot see who is talking to you.{/n} "'Found'? Don't you mean 'made'? I've had a backup shell stored away for centuries, but the events at the Spire of the Reaving Tempest convinced me one active body was not enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez à nouveau la voix du Drukhari, sans toutefois pouvoir déterminer d'où elle provient.{/n} « Trouvé ? "Fabriqué", vous voulez dire ! Cela faisait des siècles que je stockais une enveloppe de secours, mais les événements de la tour de la Tempête ravageuse m'ont convaincu qu'un seul corps actif ne suffisait pas. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}デュカーリの声が聞こえるが、誰が話しかけているかはわからない。{/n}「『見つけた』って？まさか『作った』って意味か？何世紀もの間、予備の殻を保管していたんだが、リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔での件で、活動しているのが一体だけでは足りないと確信した」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the Drukhari's voice again but cannot see who is talking to you.{/n} "'Found'? Don't you mean 'made'? I've had a backup shell stored away for centuries, but the events at the Spire of the Reaving Tempest convinced me one active body was not enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリの声が聞こえるが、誰が話しかけているかはわからない。{/n}「『見つけた』って？まさか『作った』って意味か？何世紀もの間、予備の殻を保管していたんだが、リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔での件で、活動しているのが一体だけでは足りないと確信した」
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Drukhari'nin sesi yine geliyor ama kimin konuştuğunu göremiyorsun.{/n} "'Bulmuş' muyum? 'Yapmış' olmayayım sakın? Asırlardır sakladığım yedek bir kabuğum zaten vardı ama Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'nde olanlardan sonra anladım ki bir tane beden yetmez."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the Drukhari's voice again but cannot see who is talking to you.{/n} "'Found'? Don't you mean 'made'? I've had a backup shell stored away for centuries, but the events at the Spire of the Reaving Tempest convinced me one active body was not enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari'nin sesi yine geliyor ama kimin konuştuğunu göremiyorsun.{/n} "'Bulmuş' muyum? 'Yapmış' olmayayım sakın? Asırlardır sakladığım yedek bir kabuğum zaten vardı ama Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'nde olanlardan sonra anladım ki bir tane beden yetmez."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus
